website_summaries.verdict: A big, tough guinea pig home and the value for the price is outstanding.
pros: There's lots of room, flexible accommodation, and owners love the easy access offered by the top opening
cons: Many would prefer a hay bin that fit inside the cage, not out (it can get messy)
The supplied water bottle is prone to leaks

website_summaries.verdict: This sturdy cage has everything larger land-loving furballs could possibly ask for. A solid choice for rabbits, guinea pigs, or hedgehogs.
pros: Extra floor space is ideal for "bigger" small animals
Comes with all the essentials including a water bottle, hay guard, tip-proof food dish, and a built-in hideaway
Balcony provides a separate feeding area and a safe place to perch
Features large double doors on the top of the cage for easy access
cons: Thoroughly cleaning the textured base can be a challenge
Bar spacing is too wide for rats or hamsters

website_summaries.verdict: A surprisingly big rabbit cage at its price point, easy to clean, and with plenty of thoughtful extras.
pros: Extra-large cage is big enough for most full-grown rabbits, plus their litter pan
Deep tray keeps bedding inside the cage, owners report
Built-in food bowl holder prevents spills
cons: Hay bin attaches clumsily to the side of the cage, creating a mess when moved
End caps tend to fall off
Owners report they can’t get replacement parts

customer_reviews.title: This cage is great. Very easy to put together and clean
customer_reviews.text: This cage is great. Very easy to put together and clean. I ordered 2 in a size large but after a bit my bunnies decided they liked each other and wanted to be together so I was able to connect the cages. They love their new big space.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cage!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the extra large cage for my 2 adult guinea pigs. They had outgrown their other cage & just needed more room. It took them no time to adjust to the larger living space & they love their new room. This is incredibly easy to put together. It took my daughter & I about 15 minutes total. We love how the top opens, the large hay rack and the spill proof food bowls. If you put the hay rack in the base lip it totally eliminates any hay messes outside of the cage which is huge for us. This cage is amazing and we all love it, pigs included!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Fennell

customer_reviews.title: Tater, the Hedgehog, gives this house a AAA+ Rating!
customer_reviews.text: Tater, my Hedgehog, absolutely LOVES his new house! The hidy house on the right side is where he spends his day snoozing. There is Plenty of room for the 12" Wodent Wheel for cruising the night away as well as room for dishes for food, water and treats. The Ware Plastic Scatterless Lock-N-Litter Small Pet Pan fits in one of the corners leaving plenty of room for guests or just running around like a crazy Hedgehog!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: Hedgehog Home
customer_reviews.text: I got this cage for our two hedgehogs. It works very well for them. I did have to get a ramp for them to access the top of the "cave"/enclosure. I also moved the food to the lower level to ensure that they could get to it easily. They most often choose to sleep in the built-in enclosure, sometimes they opt for under the ramp. The cage does have enough floor space and overhead clearance for their running wheel. Once assembled, the cage is nice and sturdy. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Quin's Mom!

customer_reviews.title: I have a few issues
customer_reviews.text: The door (gate) is close to left end of cage, wish it was in the middle! I can't reach the other end! If you want to reach in thru top of cage better keep the cage on a low table or on the ground. I have to set mine on a kitchen (size) table & can barely get my arms over the top, had to leave top gates off. The front of the shelf on mine doesn't detach on the front of it so my husband had to cut it off. I guess I didn't do enough research but am sure this cage would be perfect for many people. Oh well, my Guinea Pig is happy, has plenty of room!
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Definitely give this one 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect for our growing baby guinea pigs! We ended up removing the insert home and placing two huts which fit very comfortably inside. The two pigs love to run figure 8’s and it is big enough for them to enjoy. Unfortunately we will have to upgrade to a hutch for both of them to have their own space but this is well built, large, and enjoyable. The only thing I wish was that this company made some kind of table to place it on because we have cats and that would give the pigs some security above the ground. Otherwise this is a worthwhile purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kollan K.

customer_reviews.title: Very large - using for 2 Guinea Pigs (small now but they will get bigger)
customer_reviews.text: Heard that Guinea Pigs like large area and had the Large pen previously which was plenty when Guinea pigs are small, but after reading about them they like large area. This takes up more room in my daughter's room however not too much more than the large. Online price was cheaper than local store. I had installed one before so it went quickly with this 2nd one, but the first one took a while to read/understand the directions (about 30 mins). Easy open lid for getting the animals and clean up and easy. The Guinea pigs seemed to enjoy the big space immediately running around.
customer_reviews.author: RAV

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy..
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on cages for my guinea pigs and this one seemed to fit the bill. Assembly was easy... the instructions were simple and it is very sturdy. Downsides: The bottom of the cage is textured and not very cleaning-friendly. I removed the built-in shelter/second floor because it made cleaning sooo much harder and was NOT made easy to remove and replace. Also, you have no way of seeing or handling your piggies if they sit in the back of it. The little steps are also very steep for guinea pigs. I wish there was an add-on second level available.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Bass

customer_reviews.title: Standerd size is very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had the large version of this for years with my last Bun and we loved it! However, with my new bun I ordered a standard size since she's only 2 pounds. Very disappointing. The biggest issues I'm having is that the shelf is more flimsy and does not even span the width of the cage, there is a space between one side and the wall creating a dead zone where the space is just wasted. This gives less lounging space and makes it harder to clean. The water bottle and holder are also much less sturdy. It falls off if it's so much as bumped.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This cage has definite design flaws and is cheaply made. The shelf broke in less than a couple of months as well as a couple of the clips and the water bottle holder doesn't stay in place (rabbit knocks it off). The top opening doesn't stay open so it is very inconvenient and the front opening is rather small. If I would have seen it in person first, I probably wouldn't have purchased. Just looks cheap. Needing more clips but they are over $4 a piece but thinking I might just trash it and start over with a different brand because I have had to 'fix' so many things already.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson C.

customer_reviews.title: The bottle it came with definitely isn't sturdy at all and my rabbit has a hard time ...
customer_reviews.text: Yeah at the time I bought it, it was at 80 dollars however I've seen it go down to 60 dollars so I'm unhappy about that. The actual cage itself is alright. You just take off the wire part and clean the inside part. The bottle it came with definitely isn't sturdy at all and my rabbit has a hard time drinking out of it. The hay rack is the most frustrating part of it. Definitely doesn't do a good job of holding the hay in, and I end up wasting a lot. Everything seems sturdy enough, the little cave part is a nice touch. Overall decent, but nothing spectacular. Good for entry level rabbit owners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brody is a fan!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cage for our guinea pig. This cage is actually HUGE....in a good way. Brody now has a nice selection of toys, feeding areas, and places to hide, all while being able to run around to his little heart's content. It was shipped very fast and I personally put it together in about 20 minutes. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a senior ferret
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I got this cage for my senior ferret, because the multilevel was becoming too much for her. Easy assembly and instructions. I would have given it a full 5 star rating, but my only problem is the space under the food level. Too many hidden open corners, and she can't hold it like she used to when it comes to using the bathroom - so it provides more corners for her to use than I would like. I made some corner deterrents so it's not that big of a deal. Also wanted to note the ladder seen in the picture did not come with, I reused from an old cage.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Rondon

customer_reviews.title: Top of Cage falls apart everytime I open the top lid.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this cage before and I had little difficulty with it, but that was many years ago. With this particular cage the one side of the top or lid that opens and closes breaks off every time I open the cage, and I have to attach it again every time . My rabbits have chewed on it so that it is not chew proof at all. It is not easy to clean, but I have not had any cage easy to clean. The only positive about the cage is the size and the balcony. It is tough to get a good cage.
customer_reviews.author: S. Laster

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing, no manufacturer assistance
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great product and this was the 2nd one I purchased. Unfortunately, this one came missing parts and after multiple attempts I can't seem to get anyone to respond from Hagen to send me any. It would have been easier to assemble if all the parts were there because the missing parts hold the sides up... I clean mine with a vacuum cleaner and disinfectant. I also keep neonatal kittens in mine rather than guinea pigs, but I think it would be a good cage for them as well. I did have to purchase a bridge separately so the kittens can get in and out when they get big enough.
customer_reviews.author: RMAC

customer_reviews.title: Stylish roomy easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for two rabbits to sleep while I’m asleep. They’re free all day but have to put to them the bed bed because because they chew on things and get stuck behind furniture. My only issue is there there needs to be a ramp in and and out so they can come and go as as they please. My disabled 3 legged rabbit cannot get out without help. All and all it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: The Artist

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Put a Hamster in this Cage
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a cage for hamsters, as well as for larger pets. Your hamster will be through the bars within minutes. A hamster cage needs to have 3/8" between bars. This is 1 inch between bars. You will have invested, as I did, a lot of money in this cage, and your hamster will be loose in your house. Good luck finding it. It's a great cage, but it is NOT for hamsters and it should warn you of that in the description. I recycled the packaging and now I am stuck with a cage I cannot use and a hamster who is on the loose.
customer_reviews.author: C. StClair

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were half stars. I would give it two and a half. We have rabbits. The cage itself was pretty easy to put together. It maybe took 30 minutes. It’s large and i like the platform and cave. The problem i have is, it doesn’t have a tray. It is such a pain. I have to clean it like every 2-3 days. The process is rough because i have to rehome the rabbits, unsnap the cage, carry this VERY large cage outside, clean it out and then put new bedding in. It takes a lot too. If i had bought this at a store, i would return it.
customer_reviews.author: TIffany

customer_reviews.title: Awesome XL Guinea Pig Cage
customer_reviews.text: The extra large cage is perfect for my two guinea pigs. (The medium and large sizes are way too small for guinea pigs!!) The extra large cage is a spacious cage and is easy to assemble. My first one came with some plastic pieces cracked, but Amazon replaced it very quickly and easily. The only downside is the gray plastic stair that come with the cage are far too steep for my pigs to use. I took them out and left the loft part in for a convenient hiding spot that doesn't take up any floor space! Great starter cage! Get the extra large one, trust me your pigs will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: HeidiMAC

customer_reviews.title: Two complaints
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cage, very easy to put together, and it was nice everything snapped together. My two complaints : the door on the front sticks, it is almost impossible to get open and closed because of a bar, I think was put on backwards. The second complaint is the hay feeder, it is an open bin the is flush with the wall of the cage, I can understand why they designed it this way, but it allows for hay to spill out all over the floor. Otherwise, awesome cage cane wonderfully packaged, the plastic is flexible, rather than brittle. My rabbit loves it. I leave the door open, and he has 0 issue jumping out.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best Habitat Yet!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this habitat to replace the Guinea Habitat Plus that we had previously purchased from Amazon. This habitat is leaps and bounds ahead of the previous one we have, as it is much sturdier and secure. It was not hard to put together, but do pay attention, and make sure to assemble it with the parallel bars of the sides, facing the outside of the enclosure or it won't all fit together properly. I was concerned that the Guinea Pigs wouldn't climb up on the elevated shelf, but I was wrong, because they were up on it within a matter of minutes. It is a great habitat, that it very fairly priced when you compare it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B.

customer_reviews.title: Water bottle leaked and was not usable - Cage great
customer_reviews.text: The cage is large and exactly what we were looking for. It was fairly simple to assemble (20 minutes) and sturdy enough. When assembling, make sure you pay attention to the door placement. I didn't and had to reassemble that part. The water bottle holder was not strong enough to hold the water bottle AND the water bottle leaked. For that amount of money, they should reconsider the current water bottle and replace it with something that can actually be used. That is my reason for a 4 star review. We purchased a new water bottle for $10 at Petsmart and it is working out great.
customer_reviews.author: Lobotomy

customer_reviews.title: Great guinea pig cage!
customer_reviews.text: Great cage for our two guinea pigs! I like how the sides are high to help keep the bedding in. I did remove the upper level section bc our guinea pigs were young and couldn't get up there at first. The hay holder is great and I love that it came with a water bottle and good bowl. So far, the water bottle hasn't leaked. It's easy to take apart to clean. I always take the bottom off any spray it outside with the hose. Super easy!
customer_reviews.author: CBM ATX

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in shipping, too hard to send back
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great habitat but the lid was cracked quite badly in two places and the box was damaged. It's too much trouble to send it back, for one i don't have a box that size and i'm not going to go hunt one down. So i'm stuck with $150 cage with a broken top that I will have to try to glue at the broken and cracked places. This is one of the downsides to having things delivered to your door. The size of the cage is very nice and I wish it had come undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: M.F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cage HUGE!!
customer_reviews.text: So huge!!! You will love it and your pet will love you for it. I bought this for my daughters lion head bunny and it's everything I needed in a cage . In the picture thats my 7 year old daughter who is 4ft tall weighing 55lbs and she plays in there with the bunny lol Trust me you wont go wrong buying this cage and it was super easy to put together took me maybe 5 minutes .
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Broken parts, otherwise satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The directions for this are a bit vague. Make sure you really study the pictures when putting together because there are no written instructions. Also, one of the "L" clips that keep the thing together broke in two pieces during assembly. Can't figure out how to get a hold of customer service via Amazon. Will have to use cable ties. Given what this cage costs, I'm not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Emmasmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Big Bunny has made this his home for quite a while, It wasn't hard to assemble, everything works fine. Bunny spends all his time chewing on the bars. He has not managed to damage the crate at all. It's easy to clean. He likes to pop the plastic shelf up in the air, but he can't break it. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Boersman

customer_reviews.title: The cage itself is great - The accessories are just ok
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for 2 guinea pigs. The cage itself is great - The accessories are just ok... the water bottle leaks quite a bit and I decided to buy a new "house" for them because they hide in it all the time and you can't see them - plus they were chewing on the plastic. I do like that the included accessories can be moved to different locations - it doesn't have to be setup as shown.
customer_reviews.author: WSmith524

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade for my bunny
customer_reviews.text: 6/27/18 - I bought the XL habitat. It’s a much needed upgrade for my bunny, his old cage was a bit smaller and was falling apart. I just hope he doesn’t chew the plastic since he can easily find the clips. The hide away is too small for him, wish it was bigger like XL. It says easy assemble but I beg to differ. For a small person it was a bit hard to snap parts down for me and it took me an hour to put it all together. I hope this cage will hold better then my last one. Overall, very spacious and nice, just wish it wasn’t plastic clips and hide away bigger.
customer_reviews.author: marshy

customer_reviews.title: Unusable and damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived complete damaged and is unusable! Such a disappointment. The top plastic is split, and the corners are smashed. The plastic attachment latches should have a tab to click into place to hold it tight and all 4 tabs are gone/broken off. Corner plastic that holds the metal sides together is completely smashed. Shipping box wasn’t damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great for our bunny
customer_reviews.text: We have a bunny who seems to love this. Been easy enough to clean but the water bottle in it isn’t good. Get a different one. We also got a corner piece at Rural King for our bun-bun to have shavings in instead of filling this thing with shavings. She poops mostly in that which makes it easy to clean and then I just sweep up the rest with a mini broom/dustpan. Wipe with a paper towel if it’s messy and you’re done. Until tomorrow. Bunny’s are terribly messy roommates!
customer_reviews.author: AbcH

customer_reviews.title: See beliw
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter kit for ONE Piggie but we have already noticed she needs a lot more space and it’s only been two weeks! We plan on using this as a transporting cage if we need it and also one for our next Piggie during their “isolation period.” It was relatively easy to put together...but the hideaway takes up so much space and I have never seen her make it up on top to the bowl or even a treat so we keep her bowl on the floor which takes up even more space. Great starter but not a long term home.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice option for someone looking for a guinea pig habitat ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice option for someone looking for a guinea pig habitat with a lid for one or two guinea pigs (not more than 2 should be kept in this habitat). It looks nice and assembled fairly easily by following the directions. I did not include any of the extra things that create a level - as I prefer guinea pigs have the space to run around. The water bottle which came with it attaches very securely to the cage. The water bottle itself is a cheap kind of plastic but it does the job and does not leak. It comes with a plastic hay loft. Well priced on amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Good size and design
customer_reviews.text: The habitat is pretty good when out together. Good design and size. There are a few very fragile parts like the top grey rim where the curved roof sits. It is ok when put on but be careful as it twists easily and if the packaging is damaged check this piece out carefully. I would highly advice buying new and not used as there are many parts that can break or be lost if not packed in the original format or if the box is damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: NZkiwi

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR FERRETS
customer_reviews.text: This cage was fine for my ferret for a few months, though the hideaway part made it more difficult to keep clean. After a few months, he learned to squeeze through the bars in the cage. Ferrets are master escape artists with extremely flexible bodies. This cage type is not appropriate for them. I also purchased the smaller version, thinking the issue was the space between the double cage enclosures at the top. He continued to escape and I learned that wasn't the case after observing his escapes firsthand. It's a nice cage for larger animals, like bunnies. Just not for ferrets.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted2Amazon

customer_reviews.title: XL cage is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My rescue bunny needed a new cage that was larger and sturdier as he's a bit of a chewer (har har). While he has nawed a few places already (like the food bowl, the side of the built in house, and a hole in the top of the water bottle), he seems to really enjoy having a place to hide. My only complaints: the assembly was more difficult than it should have been because the instructions were ONLY pictures which were difficult to understand. Also: the hay bin is useless. It won't stay on the cage and the such thin plastic he chewed through it in about two days.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality
customer_reviews.text: My mini lop is not so mini anymore and he needed an upgrade. This xl cage is great! I was worried about it fitting in our space but it’s actually perfect. Was a little tricky for me to assemble, I put the top on backwards at first and had to take it apart which was annoying because everything was all snapped into place and it’s harder to take apart than put together! I was sad that my bun was too big for the second level/hiding cave, I took it out. He seems happy to be able to stretch out more though and I’m overall happy with this buy :)
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: This cage is perfect for a dwarf rabbit
customer_reviews.text: This cage is perfect for a dwarf rabbit. It fits a cat sized litterbox and still gives rabbit a little room to hop. HOWEVER... the size is a little misleading once all the furnishing is in it. I would NOT recommend anything less then an XL for a dwarf bunny. Our bunny is only 9 weeks old and when he gets to be his full size (even though he is a dwarf bunny) we very well may need a bigger cage. If you have a bunny and prop his cage door open and have him in some kind of play pen or free range inside then this cage (in XL size) is absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne B.

customer_reviews.title: Great habitat for a larger size hamster etc.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this for her hamster. The size was worth the amount paid however, the cage slots are too BIG for a small hamster! He got out! We had to buy metal netting to attach to the cage to avoid that from happening again. But everything else about the cage is nice. It is very roomy for all the items she has for him. The size we bought was a lot lager than expected but we are happy with it. I would recommend this but for a much bigger hamster than the one we have etc. as to avoid your pet from getting out.
customer_reviews.author: McGeHee24

customer_reviews.title: It'd probably be nice if I had all the parts to assemble it.
customer_reviews.text: This cage seems really nice. I ordered the XL and I think it will be plenty large for the rabbit I will be bringing home. It seems very sturdy and I can sit inside of it with my legs extended. The only problem is that I never received the clips that fit into the base of the cage to hold the barred walls in place. I'm trying to find a way to contact their customer support but keep coming up with dead ends. I noticed they sell these pieces separately for $5 but I don't think I should have to buy them again if I should have received them the first time around.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: very large pigs can run around in circles in cage
customer_reviews.text: there is lots of room for pigs to run around in cage we got blankets for cage bottom works much better then bedding high plastic sides keep stuff from flying out when pigs run around comes with a bottle that doesn't leak , shelf/ house, food dish, and hay dispenser just about everything you need we didn't use the shelf / house we used separate houses so pigs could run around outside with house In center also it is easy to put blanket in and sweep up poops rather then bedding
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hill

customer_reviews.title: Team build would be helpful
customer_reviews.text: Haha assembles “in minutes”. That’s just funny. Wasn’t too bad to assemble but the directions are a little lacking and the top lids still look bad even though I’m pretty certain they’re on correctly. Plenty of space for bun so that’s good, the hay dispenser is kinda goofy so left that off. Advise to not put cage up past your waste anywhere or else it’s very hard to access the inside. I put on top of a short dresser & have a bit of an issue with this. Otherwise seems solid enough, just ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great for guide pigs
customer_reviews.text: Bought for two guinea pigs. I assembled it myself, and I don’t normally assemble anything myself. So, it’s safe to say it was easy to assemble. Sturdy. Nice. I like that it has hard plastic bottom with high sides. The feeder was useless after a couple days-it kept coming off. The water bottle That comes with the cage was very cheap and did not stay on at all, but luckily I already had my own. I’d definitely recommend getting your own water bottle before relying on the one that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Water bottle idea is nice but again flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Big and spacious for our 2 bunnies. They are in the habitat overnight and can roam freely in our bunny-proof house during the day. They are potty trained. Cage can fit large cat litter box. Not too crazy about the hay compartment. Flimsy but idea is there. Water bottle idea is nice but again flimsy. The red food bowl is a plus. Works well and stays intact; does not get kicked around like in other reviews. Over all pretty happy with purchase. Easy to assemble. Husband and 7 yo son did it in 10-15 mins with a toddler messing around...
customer_reviews.author: #3Makes5

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered...this is a completely different brand
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like described. Why is it red? Has no front door!? Very flimsy! So frustrated! I needed the cage because I had the bunnies to pick up same day, my husband put together while I was at work and I cake home to this!? It doesn’t have a dome lid and is an eye sore. The only positive is the size.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Xlarge bunny habitat
customer_reviews.text: Very nice new home for our bunny. it's very large and roomy. My 13 yr old daughter assembled this by herself in about an hour. I like the multiple ways to access it. We use the hay feeder for grass and leaves also. The bunny seems quite happy with it. The only negative is that it is very large and seems like it will be hard to clean. Fortunately our bunny is litter trained because there is no pan to pull out, the whole thing will have to be cleaned when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cage
customer_reviews.text: I have 1 adult guinea pig. He is by himself because he doesn't get along with other guineas. There is plenty of space inside of this cage. I got standard size. He likes hiding in the house a lot. He chewed a little on the edge of the plastic house thing though. I had to get a different water bottle because the one the came with it leaks and gets his cage soaked. Other than the water bottle issue, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Its a cheaper, slightly flimsy cage but good for the price. The side door is useless and designed terribly but the top works great. Definently wouldnt recommend this cage if you have dogs, little kids or anyone that may be rough with the cage. Unfortunately, ours package came really banged up and the bottom tray of the cage and ramp were smashed and cracked. However, the customer service at Hagen was great! They were quick to respond and send out new pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Momshopper

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up to chewing animals
customer_reviews.text: Terrible for a rabbit. This cage fell apart within the first three months. It is a great idea but does not hold up. The wire portion does not stay together and we had to zip tie it. We now have a hutch. Maybe for another non-chewing animal this would be great, but for an animal that chews it will destroy the parts that keep the wire sides together.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Impossible directions and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be large enough for our rabbit over winter and also easy to clean and not chewable. However, so far 4 clips have broken, I worked for 3 hours and did not finish because right now I want to run over it with my car. The directions are very poor and every time it’s all in place, something pops out. Why can’t we have products that have quality and instructions that are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Sharp Critic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cage for your money.
customer_reviews.text: First thing, you need a different water bottle. The one that comes with it leaks like a cracked dam. Other than that, you will not get a better cage than this for your money. It's massive, roomy, and easy to clean. My rat that I got it for died 3 weeks after we got it, my wife immediately got 2 guinea pigs to replace him (vulture), and they love it. We got the large, you can easily keep a medium sized rodent pet in this, our rat was very large, a hamster, mouse, or small rat could get out of the bars, but it's so roomy they'd have to be particularly motivated to bother.
customer_reviews.author: Vargr

customer_reviews.title: Too small for two bun buns
customer_reviews.text: This might be a good cage for someone who has a super lazy bunny. I have 2 little 2 pound holland lop bunnies. They are so sad when I put them in here. Not nearly enough room to hop around. I read such good reviews. I thought this must be a dream cage. And, it looks large. But when you add a litter box and water bowl there is almost no floor space. For a bunny I would reccomend you check out a dog excersize pen instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Great for bunnies, kids, cats
customer_reviews.text: This thing is gigantic! My 100 lb child fit in it with plenty of room to spare. For obvious reasons I could not keep the child in it, but it has worked out fantastic for our lop eared bunny. Also, in case you're wondering, the roof section does hold up to the weight of 5 cats.
customer_reviews.author: jad23

customer_reviews.title: Best cage ever!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters had purchased two guinea pigs and a cage from Amazon. The cage they purchased was a tarp bottom and it was stinky! I purchased this cage and now the guinea pigs can live in the living room because they don't stink! The cage is spacious and easy to clean. This cage came with everything the girls needed for their pets. We are one happy family now!
customer_reviews.author: carlsoncarl

customer_reviews.title: Best cage I ever bought!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest thing I ever bought! I bought this cage for my Chihuahua to live in with her newborn puppies. This worked so well with the puppies growing up!!! Easy to set up and easy to clean! So glad I tried this cage!! I will never use anything else for my puppies. I was worried about my cat hurting the puppies, but they stayed very safe inside with their mother when I was not able to keep an eye on them. The entery door snaps shut tight so no animal can open it. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for small bunnies
customer_reviews.text: At first we loved this cage, but the platform inside has about a half inch gap on each side and our baby bunny slid down and got it's back legs stuck. It ended up breaking one of her back legs and ending with an injured bunny and very sad little girl :(
customer_reviews.author: shay

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched parts
customer_reviews.text: While this cage seems promising, the item arrived with mismatched panels that do not fit properly. Customer service also shared that we cannot get replacement parts but will have to return the entire item. Given the size of the cage (approximately 4 feet long) it's a significant inconvenience and makes it unlikely that we will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Rabbit Cage for small rabbit
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cage compared to one I already have. It's so much nicer to lift the top to get the bunny instead of a small door in the front. Also, the bunny loves the shelf and lays there quite a bit. If he doesn't want held, he runs into the rabbit hole which is so cute. He's was less than 1 lb. and is now almost 2 lb. and still goes in the hole. I put a litter in the back right corner and he's doing really well. This is definitely a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry A. Barndt

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: This cage was the second one I have gotten for my daughter's two dwarf hamsters. I had to add chicken wire along the sides because my daughter's hamster was able to squeeze through. Totally worth it! She loves the size and it fits perfectly under her desk. The other thing she and I dislike is that the sliding door at the front of the cage is terrible! It's very hard to open and close and I jammed my finger in it. It's definitely worth it for the price and I would recommend it to anyone looking to upgrade their cage.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Z.

customer_reviews.title: A good all-around cage for one adult guinea pig.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the cage and large enough for my one adult guinea pig; I think it would be crowded with more than one though. I removed the ledge because it was impossible to clean under it without taking the cage apart...not that difficult but time consuming. The cage is easy to disassemble and put back in place once the initial set up is done...just unlatch the wire top and lift off; easy to clean with an ammonia and water mix. The lack of vertical bars has made it difficult to keep water bottles hung in place outside the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Seahorse

customer_reviews.title: I love it.  My pigs not so much
customer_reviews.text: I thought I loved this cage it was so roomy and it had the feeders and house with it. I was so easy to put together too. Unfortunately my two Guinea pigs aren’t very happy. They have been in it for a few days now and they won’t jump up on the house to eat where the food goes they can’t get hay from the feeder and they refuse to drink out of the water bottle. I find it strange because they went crazy the last time I bought them a new house. Hopefully in the next weeks they will adjust
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: 😭😭😭 arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I have been excitedly anticipating arrival all weekend. When it finally arrived I was so excited... it arrived broken 💔. I don't want to go through all the trouble of having to return it and wait for another one to come. I was hoping they would just replace the broken part but when I called the 800 number no one answered. It says they close at 4 it's only 3. 😭
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sommer

customer_reviews.title: Great critter cage!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cage for our netherland dwarf rabbit. It was very easy to assemble. Very spacious! Would work for a variety of pets. I gave it 4 stars for chew proof only because it is a plastic base, platform and clips so I am sure a toothly pet would find something to chew on! We just haven’t had any issues. Easy to clean/take apart for a good wipe down. No negatives for us!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great, spacious cage!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a cage big enough for our two guineas. They actually have room to run around, and they love to sit up on the loft by their food dish and watch the world as they munch. The domed roof gives the cage a classy look and makes it seem even more spacious. The only drawback I've found is that the front sliding 'door' doesn't open easily, but I suspect either I've not found the right way to open it, or it might get easier with use. Either way, we use the roof access, which works fine. This is a very nice, solid cage at a reasonable price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Laure Holden

customer_reviews.title: The best cage you could buy
customer_reviews.text: We have several of these cages for our different critters, and will never use another kind of cage again. They are durable, have a secure lid to keep other furry friends from getting to the cirtters inside, and are roomy and spacious. We got creative and connected two of them end to end to make a long cage for our rabbit, who loved hopping back and forth between the two. They are the only cage I recommend to people, and I will never use another brand.
customer_reviews.author: jjcrazycat

customer_reviews.title: Big but very wobbly, even when assembling properly. Hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feelings about this cage. On the plus side lots of room for my two guinea pigs which they enjoy. Downside was assembling and cleaning takes me at least 45 minutes. I have a hard time keeping it from falling apart when putting the cage on the base. The corners are not firmly attached. It is OK but probably would not buy again, was very expensive for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Best rabbit cage I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: We have had our fair share of rabbit cages and this is by far the best. It's large, sturdy and so easy to clean! I love that the ENTIRE TOP opens!! Our rabbit is very happy in it and I would buy it over again if I ever needed to!
customer_reviews.author: PAsFab5

customer_reviews.title: Great cage! Our two Guinea pigs love it
customer_reviews.text: Great cage! Our two Guinea pigs love it! Very spacious. We cut a piece of corrugated plastic the size of the bottom and fold our fleece bedding and towels layer under. Keeps them from burrowing the bedding out. Makes for very easy clean up. We bought a hand vac (with nozzle attachment) and designated it for the cage for easy, everyday cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: SenoritaBeefeatah

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECCOMEND!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this cage. I have one guinea pig named honey. The cage is spacious enough for him to do hotlaps in. He is definitely one happy piggie to have a lot of space for his chewing toys and hideouts
customer_reviews.author: Alexis K

customer_reviews.title: Best Cage Out There!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this is the best cage, by far, I have ever used. It is extremely functional and comfortable for small animals. It includes all necessary accessories (hay bin, water bottle, removable feeding bowl, shelter/hiding space,etc). I was so impressed by it I bought a second cage. The price is very reasonable for what you get. Anyone who sees the cage thinks it's great. I have the XL size and I can't think of another cage at this price point on the market. I would strongly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: kazankota

customer_reviews.title: Cracked Bottom Tray, Otherwise a Great Cage!
customer_reviews.text: The cage is great. Nice and roomy for one Guinea Pig. Easy to assemble. I liked that it had a higher sides on the bottom to keep shavings, hay and poop from falling out of cage. Easy to clean the cage because the top opens up almost completely. You can also unlatch the bottom tray to take outside and hose down. We removed the platform because once it is in, it is hard to clean underneath it. We ended up buying a little free standing igloo instead. The only bad thing was the tray on the bottom was cracked. I decided to keep it rather than deal with the hassle of sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy to put together, plenty of room!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! My Guineas have the perfect amount of room, and it was so EASY to put together. My only problem was I couldn’t use the water bottle it came with because it wouldn’t stay if you put water in it. The side door is a little hard to open. So if you want to use the side door to not scare your piggies not awesome for the job, but still works fine. Also, I have had to move this to clean it and it was as light as a feather! I would totally recommend this product, just don’t get it for the water bottle! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kohn

customer_reviews.title: Best Indoor Bunny Cage
customer_reviews.text: I looked for some time trying to find an indoor bunny cage that suited my needs. I needed something large, easy to clean and somewhat light weight. I'm not super handy, so doing a DIY cage was a no go for me. But after some research I decided to purchase this cage. I'm glad I did! It is easy to assemble, easy to clean, and easy to move. I plan on buying another cage and connecting it to the one I have now so I can have a super bunny house :)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R. Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Best cage for my bunny!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is perfect for my bunny! There's plenty of room for her to stretch out or run around, the hay basket helps keep her bedding cleaner, and the food shelf gives her the perfect little hiding spot! Also, the opening at the top makes it a lot easier to pick her up and put her back in the cage. A few other reviewers said that it was hard to assemble but I didn't have any problems... It only took me about 10 minutes to build. Overall I'm very pleased with the product and the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jj H

customer_reviews.title: Good cage, but sadly arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this XL cage based on reviews. I was quite excited about it, but a corner of the cage arrived broken, but I had no time to exchange it as my rabbit has arrived home. While it still works it's disappointing. Especially considering the fact that the manufacturer lowered the price by $40 right after I ordered it. Super weird.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Everywhere

customer_reviews.title: Massive cage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to give my guinea pig as much space as possible while working on plans for a custom cage. It is HUGE. it was about half the price as the same cage at the pet store which helped with the decision. I love the size and how sturdy it is. Had to give it 4 stars though because the water bottle and hay rack are very cheap/thin plastic, and with my 8yo regularly taking care of the guinea pig I can see I will be purchasing better replacements very soon. I also wish the ramp up to the "loft" was at an easier angle for smaller animals.
customer_reviews.author: wasamarie

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had to buy two cages for my two baby rabbits who hate each other at this stage. That’s the biggest size cage I found. Easy to put together, they figured out a way to open the sliding door within 5 minutes. The floor surface is textured in a way that makes lots of dirt stick to it in a way that is nearly impossible to clean perfectly. I don’t think small pets would slide so bad that that much if texturing was necessary. If u ask me, they need none as you would put some blanket anyway. I would have given it 5 stars, but having clean cage is somewhat important enough to remove a star.
customer_reviews.author: Giaomgia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Cage is very spacious and very peasant to look at. Beautiful colors and very clean. I’m happy with the cage. However, it did come with a broken piece. This was unfortunate and we were short on time, the cage works well without the broke piece so we decided to keep it. If I had more time I would have sent it back and gotten the same one.
customer_reviews.author: anamaria navarro

customer_reviews.title: I have happy bunnies!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my bunnies. This cage is gigantic! It comes with a hay holder, a food bowl, a water bottle, and a covered house for the rabbits. The entire roof opens for easy access and there is also a sliding door on the side. I prefer the top access because it is a very large opening. I didn't think this cage was going to be very sturdy but I was wrong the base is a nice thick plastic and the wires are nice and strong as well. This cage is a great deal for under $100. Again Ill say its huge!!!! My bunnies are happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my two Netherland Dwarf Bunnies!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my bunnies. Plenty of room for them to move around in. They love the hideaway. Easy to clean. Easy to get the bunnies out. I'm very glad I got the large one. I don't think the smaller ones would be big enough, even though my bunnies are very small and will stay small. I can fit a small cage liner bed on the landing above the hideaway, and they love that.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah R.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bunny house ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this habitat! And so does my bun! This is his third enclosure first was homemade two story that was so hard to keep clean, the second was an expensive wooden hutch that he liked but was too narrow and so hard to clean. He has a lot of room to hop around and loves the hidey hole this is the best and is so easy to take care of
customer_reviews.author: Jillian House

customer_reviews.title: Perfect holding cage for temporary feline quarantine (spay/neuter/pregnancy)
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a quarantine cage for pregnant or new-mother cats, and it's perfect. I absolutely love this extra-large cage. It holds a mother and four kittens perfectly with room to move around and stretch their little legs. Nearly every piece of the cage is available as a replacement part if one breaks. It's easy to assemble and take apart, easy to clean, and very well-designed. I really love this thing. It's nearly identical in length to the width of a full-size bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: GlassWolf

customer_reviews.title: Great cage! The extras with it suck though.
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly pleased with the cage. It was easy to put together and a great size. The only reason I put four stars is the extras that come with it are basically garbage. The water bottle leaks, the hay attachment is flimsy and doesn’t really sit well for my rabbit to get hay out of it and the stairs for the second level shelf are completely useless. I still think the cage is great though. I already had other stuff from a previous cage that I used. I added in a small litter pan to keep from having to always wash out the whole cage.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous ordering this online, but ended up very happy with it. I was able to assemble it by myself in about 15 minutes, and it was a very solid cage. The size was also perfect for two guinea pigs, and although they never go to the second level it comes in very handy for a hideout - eliminating the need for an additional hut. Water bottle was also great quality (something I usually don't have the best luck with). All of it is very easy to clean and maintain, and I would definitely order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: JStock76

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Water bottle, very dehydrated rabbit
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, I LOVE this XL cage! However, the water bottle would not hydrate my Polish rabbit, she couldn’t get anything out of the bottle and I did not realize right away and found her very dehydrated. Luckily I caught the issue in time. The cage is durable, well built and versatile. I love the elevated feeding area and hay holder. My rabbit is small, about 3 pounds so this is condo like for her but I also gave her a good size area for exercise in our house. She loves the cage as a main sanctuary and food source (with a different water bottle!!)
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2 guinea pigs. We had the standard and it seemed to be getting a little crowded so we waited for the XL to go on sale and bought it. Easy to assemble and seems to be the perfect size for them. They have enough room for their sleeping area, a place for their food and water and room to run around :)
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: This cage is really great. The only modification I had to make was ...
customer_reviews.text: This cage is really great. The only modification I had to make was the hay basket - being on the outside if someone accidentally knocks it then the hay falls all over the ground, so I taped the bottom of it to the cage so the hay can't be knocked out. I also had to replace the water bottle because my son dropped it in the sink and the bearing broke and leaked everywhere. The only other problem was the sliding door... it was very difficult to get open and closed to lock. I ended up using a carabiner hook to lock it so it's easier to open when we need to. Cleaning the cage is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: osciamella

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews, but this 1 is completely necessary. This cage has been absolutely amazing. Our bunny loves it! We got the large size, and it is huge. This cage is also very easy to put together and clean. It literally takes less than 5 minutes to clean. I am so impressed and will recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my two ferrets
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my ferrets because they kept pooping all over the tiered cage i had. having one floor help with poop control. i keep a cat sized litter box clipped to the wall in one corner and a bed next to it so they dont have a lot of floor space. i have a play pen i let them out to stretch their legs. the only con is that the cage has wide bars. the ferret cant slip through but its difficult to screw on cage accessories like a food dish because of the spacing. Overall i am happy to use this cage compared to the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great home for bunnies!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought one for my grandson's bunnies last year. One of them had babies, so I got him a second one for the momma. Easy to clean, plenty of room, secure, easy to access the bunnies and very easy assembly. Since then, we're down to one bunny in the house so the second cage is back in the box, ready for our next indoor bunny. I do need to find out about replacement parts...I broke the small tab off of the black clips that go on the top when I was taking the cage apart. Does anyone know if they're available?
customer_reviews.author: Kris M, Millville, PA

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our new pet rabbit. Easy to assemble. Easy to clean. Easy to get him in and out. He loved having the cubby hole to hide in when he didn't want to be bothered. The hay holder worked great. We'd get some fall out from the bottom but maybe I didn't have it seated properly. I was extremely happy with the price for this cage. I thought it was very reasonable and the quality was excellent. The feed dish sits on the platform on a raised area which helps keep it from sliding around. This was a great feature. Very happy with this cage.
customer_reviews.author: GenXer

customer_reviews.title: pets love, looks nice, easy access, perfect
customer_reviews.text: My bunny loves this cage. I rescued him from a hoarder, so when he came to my house he had no cage at all. I figured he might like one (xl) so I ordered this. BEST IDEA. He loves his cage, it is big, has a sleep area, and you can just open the lid and pet him. Definitely worth the price. The only complainy was putting it together. The directions were a little hard to follow, but understandably there were a lot of parts because of the features. Besides that there are NO downsides whatsoever. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Happy rabbit!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more happy with the rabbit cage. It was pretty easy to assemble other than the sides on the top of the cage never did go in place as well as they should've, but the cage is so nice it won't keep me from giving it my full approval. The most important thing is, our rabbit loves his new home. If you're wondering how I know it's because he had went to extremes to escape every cage we had tried before with success. He never even tried to get out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Will Pappan

customer_reviews.title: Quality cage! Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the standard size for two nether dwarfs. It is still large and awesome quality. Everything it came with is great except for the water bottle. It’s large and slips easily and drips. I replaced it with a choco h528 no drip water bottle that is awesome. No drip, no slip, and perfect size. I would recommend this cage to anyone just replace the water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this!! So worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Had issues with the shipping however, when received this it was perfect for our dwarf bunny! This is really huge as I'm 5'0" and weight 125lbs and can fit in it along with my 4 year old daughter and then some.... Very spacious and we can tell our bunny loves this! This is soo worth the price because something similar (but way smaller) to this at "Petco" runs around $120 (In Hawaii).
customer_reviews.author: JK808

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely what I was looking for for our Bunny. We have a 6 month old dwarf lion head and got the biggest one. He has plenty of room to hop around. I can easily fit my 11 year old in it lol. It was easy to assemble. The instructions are a bit odd, however. The only con I've found so far is the textured bottom could make cleaning a bit of a pain. But since I clean his cage daily and hes mostly litter trained, it hasn't been an issue for me. Most importantly, it's safe, secure and our bunny loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Works well for our two guinea pigs. The only issue I have with the cage is that my piggies have figured out that they can retreat under the integrated elevated shelf and it is NOT easy to get them out of there. The pieces is removable - so I could easily solve this challenge by taking the shelf out and providing them with a movable shelter. Also, I use paper bedding and this cage requires a lot of it. Overall very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for my two baby guinea pigs until I ...
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for my two baby guinea pigs until I can build them something bigger. It is definitely not big enough for the two of them as adults. Also, the platform ended up being more trouble than it was worth for me. It trapped urine and feces in the nooks and ridges while giving them help in their quest to kick all their hay out of the cage. I ended up just taking it out. The bottom of the cage has a grid texture that makes cleaning it a bit challenging. It teats apart paper towels as I try to while it clean and seems to help trap down staining.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Great cage, well built
customer_reviews.text: Nice cage. Easy enough to assemble if you actually LOOK at the directions. If you had problems, you weren't paying attention. Guinea Pig is doing just fine in it, hopping around and making happy noises. The whole top opens which makes my daughters cleaning job a lot easier. Good product. We're content.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great for a guinea pig.
customer_reviews.text: We have the standard size for one guinea pig, it has enough room for two. The assembly instructions were easy to follow. I like that you can open the top or use the side slide door to accesses the cage. The platform - hideaway, is great. The food dish is off the ground and will not tip when a piggy stands on it. It sits inside a grove that supports it on the platform.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper 4 many years

product_meta.title: Living World Deluxe Habitat
product_meta.description: Size:X-Large| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingLiving World Deluxe Habitat is a rabbit cage that provides everything you need for safely housing rabbits. This small animal pen is also suitable for use as a guinea pig cage, hamster cage, ferret cage, and chinchilla cage. The hybrid cage, consisting of an upper wire frame and a plastic bottom base, provides a safe, well ventilated, and comfortable place for small pets. The wire cage is elegantly styled, with an arcing red wire top and white wire sides. The wire top opens easily in 2 separate parts for easy access inside the cage. There is a wire door at the front for additional accessibility. Includes a balcony with an access ramp and a tip proof food dish that secures to the balcony floor. The food bowl is the perfect cage accessory to add in your rabbit food, rabbit treats, guinea pig food, guinea pig treats, ferret food, ferret treats, chinchilla food, chinchilla treats, hamster food and hamster treats. There is also a hideaway space under the balcony to provide your small pet with a quiet and secure hiding place. The Deluxe Habitat also comes with a drip proof water bottle and a hay guard, both of which are located outside the cage to save interior space and allow easy maintenance access. Rabbit and guinea pig cages need to be kept dry and cleaned regularly to make sure your pet is happy and healthy. The cage assembles in minutes using eight easy to use plastic clips, no tools required. The large animal cage’s size has enough space for small animal cage accessories including small animal toys, small animal litter box, small animal hammocks, small animal beds, hamster toys, hamster ball, hamster wheel, hamster hideouts, guinea pig toys, guinea pig hideouts, guinea pig beds, ferret toys, ferret beds, ferret hammock, chinchilla toys, chinchilla wheel, rabbit toys, rabbit litter box and more (all sold separately)! Place small animal bedding, such as guinea pig bedding or hamster bedding, on the bottom of the cage to create a perfect space for your pet.
feature_bullets: Habitat that provides everything you need for safely housing a small animal such as a rabbit, guinea pig, hamster, ferret, or chinchilla
Small animal cage is designed with an upper wire frame and a plastic bottom base, which provides a safe, well ventilated, and comfortable place for small pets
Includes a balcony with access ramp and small animal hideout, tip proof small animal food bowl, drip proof small animal water bottle, and hay guard
Animal cage assembles in minutes using 8 easy to use plastic clips; no tools required
Dimensions: 46.9 L x 22.8 W x 24 H inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
